Recipe.title: Dutch Oven Fajitas
Recipe.Source: The Tortillas come from kitchen of Sandra Clawson

section.title: Tortillas
section.instruction: Using a fork, mix Flour, Salt, and Shortening.
Add Luke-Warm Water and blend well.
On a lightly-floured flat surface, knead about 50 times.
Break into 1&inch;-2&inch; balls and let sit for 15 minutes.
Place Dutch Oven lid, upside down on enough charcoals to make moderately hot.
By hand, flatten each ball into a Tortilla shape. (The thinner the better.)
Cook on Dutch Oven lid until each side is slightly golden in spots. Don't break air bubbles!

section.title: Filling
section.instruction: Cut Beef into long thin strips.
Cut Onion, Green Peppers, and Red Pepper into long thin strips.
Cut Tomato into thin wedge sections.
Heat Dutch Oven on a moderate amount of charcoals.
With no lid, stirring occasionally, cook Beef strips until Lightly Brown.
Add Onion, Chili Powder, Black Pepper, Garlic Salt, Worcestershire Sauce and Corn Starch, then stir occastionally until Beef is fully cooked.
Add Green Peppers, Red Pepper and Tomato, and saut√© until Peppers are fully cooked.

Modifications.modification: If desired, you can use store-bought Tortillas.
